visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart should have axes and labels styled with specific colors, font sizes, and styles. The data series should include two series: 'Sales' and 'Expenses', with corresponding data. Custom colors should be provided for the series. Additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart uses a custom font family '1customname' for all text elements. The chart's background is set to a light gray color (#f9f9f9), and margins are adjusted for better spacing. The x-axis displays months with styled labels, while the y-axis shows the amount in USD with its own styled title and labels. The data series includes two sets of data: 'Sales' and 'Expenses', each with specific custom colors. The legend is enabled and styled to match the overall theme of the chart. This configuration ensures a visually appealing and informative chart presentation.
